text: Ora mungguh tumrape manu- sa, yen diparingi Kitab dening Allah lan kawicaksanan tuwin kanabian banjur calathu marang wong-wong: Padha dadia kawula- ku, saliyane Allah; ananging (pangucape masthi): Padha dadia wong kang manembah ing Pangeran, amarga saka anggonira mulang Kitab sarta amarga saka anggonira maca
